name: Bongus Bright-eye & The Great Axe-stravaganza
description:
After countless years of waging war against the Demon threat, the dwarves enjoyed a century of peace. But after the centuries of silence, Antagon Stonegaze, the Demon King, has finally returned to the Dwarven Kingdom of Mount Tungsten and turned all the dwarves into stone.

Our protagonist Bongus Bright-Eye the Rockbroker was met with a bad stomach after having a feast for himself at the local Rock'o'bell, and had occupied the bathroom for some time, all while his whole kingdom was being attacked and turned into stone by the Demon King and his henchmen.

The only thing that can kill Angaton Stonegaze, is the Axe of Kindness, which was destroyed during the battle between Antagon and the Dwarf King, Wolfram Rockbottom. Bongus’ only possible way to save the kingdom and his people is by seeking out Durlin Twinkletoes, the human Wizard, to help him fix the broken Axe of Kindness, and defeat Antagon Stonegaze once and for all.

Exploration

Go on an adventure to explore the kingdom of Mount Tungsten, the city of Babblebrook and the beautiful meadow, learning new faces and making new friends along the way.

Features

The game includes full voice acting and music to accompany you throughout your adventure. 13 unique characters are featured to guide you towards your destination, bringing along comedy and great company to keep your mind occupied.


Team

We're a small team of 3 with minimal programming knowledge, who have worked on this game for a couple of months and decided to release it on steam. We hope you enjoy our little project!
